3 Years / Unlimited Km Warranty & 3 Years / Unlimited Km Service Plan.
FEATURES Include: 6 Airbags, Aircon, Auto Head Lights, Auto Wipers, Central Locking, Climate Control, Cruise Control, Electric Mirrors & Windows, Driver Electric Seat Only, Leather Interior, Multi-Function Steering, Radio/CD/Mp3 with AUX & USB Port, Bluetooth, Reverse Camera, Xenon Lights. 

Price excludes delivery and registration fees.
